org.xlattice.corexml.om

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.corexml.om.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Attr, Comment, DocumentType, Holder, ProcessingInstruction, Text

    public abstract class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass for all XML nodes in XLattice's object model.
    Author:
    Jim Dixon

      Runs down the graph counting nodes by type; another Visitor.

    • Method Detail

      • getDocument

        public Document getDocument()
        Returns:
        this node's ultimate parent, the XML document

      • setDocument

        public void setDocument(Document newDoc)
        Change this node's ultimate parent, its Document. This gets overridden in Holder and possibly elsewhere. XXX possibility of introducing cycles or inconsistencies
        Parameters:
        newDoc - new value assigned; may be null

      • getHolder

        public Holder getHolder()
        Get this node's parent.
        Returns:
        a reference to this Node's immediate parent

      • setHolder

        public void setHolder(Holder h)
        Set or change this node's immediate parent; also change this node's ultimate parent if necessary. XXX There is no check for inconsistencies with the parent's NodeList, nor against the introduction of cycles into the node graph.
        Parameters:
        h - a reference to the new parent, may be null

      • walkAll

        public void walkAll(Visitor v)
        Walk a Visitor through a Node. This is overridden when suitable by subclasses.
